text.name: info1
text.text: Adobe Flash was a proprietary multimedia software platform

text.name: info2
text.text: used for production of animations, applications and games.

text.name: info3
text.text: It was introduced in the mid 1990s and reached end-of-life

text.name: info4
text.text: in 2020 when it was replaced with open HTML5 technologies.
